description: One Day, while walking home a young college student is followed by a creepy old man. She runs to a nearby park in an attempt to get away from him, but is captured bu someone hiding in the shadows. The pervert strips her naked and mercilessly has his way with her! Another man, hearing her cries for help, comes to her aid and chases the pervert away. But as our girl quickly gathers up her clothes and turns to get dressed, her rescuer starts having lusty thoughts of his own!
title: Moral Hazard
